think_procedure: 1. Identify the knob 'full_page_writes' in PostgreSQL. 2. Understand the purpose of this knob, which controls whether full-page writes are enabled or disabled during a checkpoint. 3. Determine if there are any special values associated with this knob. 4. Check if it has a special value that alters its behavior significantly, such as -1 or 0. 5. Conclude that the knob has a regular numerical setting (0 or 1) but does not have a special value that breaks the natural order.
